properties.Name: Kennedy River Rest Stop
properties.descriptio: Overnight parking available.

properties.Name: Cathedral Grove
properties.descriptio: Incredible hiking though 800-year-old trees. Beautiful scenery.

properties.Name: Wild Pacific Trail
properties.descriptio: Hiking trail with wild ocean views, rainforests, and a historic lighthouse.

properties.Name: Hole In the Wall (Swimming Hole)
properties.descriptio: Great for a pit stop and dip in the river.

properties.Name: Hot Springs Cove
properties.descriptio: Remote hot springs surrounded by wilderness.

properties.Name: Chesterman Beach
properties.descriptio: Large beach ideal for surfing, relaxing, and photography.

properties.Name: Wickaninnish Beach
properties.descriptio: Large beach ideal for surfing, relaxing, and photography.

properties.Name: Long Beach
properties.descriptio: Large beach ideal for surfing, relaxing, and photography.

properties.Name: Cliff Jumping
properties.descriptio: Fun cliff jumping spot, perfect for a quick break or midday picnic.

properties.Name: Ucluelet Aquarium
properties.descriptio: Fun for the whole family, with a focus on local species (catch-and-release only).

properties.Name: The Butchart Gardens
properties.descriptio: One of the top gardens of the world, this is not to be missed.

properties.Name: Chinatown
properties.descriptio: Quirky part of downtown, fun shops, great sight-seeing.

properties.Name: Fisherman's Wharf
properties.descriptio: Come see seals & other marine life along this quaint floating pier with food kiosks & shops.

properties.Name: Mile Zero Monument
properties.descriptio: The Mile 0 marker is the start of the over 8,000 km Trans-Canada Highway that spans the entire length of Canada.

properties.Name: Christ Church Cathedral
properties.descriptio: Large, beautiful, historical cathedral in central Victoria.

properties.Name: Pacific Northwest Raptors
properties.descriptio: Get up close and personal to beautiful birds of prey! Fun for the whole family.

properties.Name: WildPlay, Nanaimo
properties.descriptio: Tree canopy obstacle course with zip lines, bungy jumps & a 150 foot swing over a canyon.

properties.Name: Nourish Kitchen & Cafe
properties.descriptio: This restaurant & cafe serves simple farm-fresh mains & snacks in an airy, bright Victorian house. Vegan friendly.

properties.Name: CANOE Brewpub
properties.descriptio: Local beer and fantastic views.

properties.Name: Old Country Market
properties.descriptio: Load up on all your road snacks!  There is so much to see here, and don't forget about the goats!

properties.Name: West Coast Waffles
properties.descriptio: Perfect for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

properties.Name: Tacofino
properties.descriptio: The OG Tacofino, a staple for anyone visiting the area.  Best post-surf meal around.

properties.Name: Wya Point Surf Shop Cafe
properties.descriptio: Road snacks.

properties.Name: Vancouver Island Brewing
properties.descriptio: Excellent craft beer selection.

properties.Name: Phillips Brewing & Malting
properties.descriptio: Excellent craft beer selection.

properties.Name: Sea Cider
properties.descriptio: Check out the local selection of homemade ciders.

properties.Name: Merridale Cidery & Distillery
properties.descriptio: Check out the local selection of homemade ciders.

properties.Name: Base Camp Adventure Rentals
properties.descriptio: Looking for a rental camper van or bike rental?

properties.Name: Sports Rent
properties.descriptio: Bike rentals.

properties.Name: Live To Surf - The Original Tofino Surf Shop
properties.descriptio: Surf gear, rentals, supplies, and advice.

properties.Name: LONG BEACH SURF SHOP
properties.descriptio: Surf gear, rentals, supplies, and advice.

properties.Name: Sproat Lake Provincial Park
properties.descriptio: Camping with nice sunset views.

properties.Name: Grice Bay Boat Launch
properties.descriptio: No overnight parking, but quiet, serene views

properties.Name: Clover Point Kite Park
properties.descriptio: Don't visit the island without flying a kite! Overnight parking found here.
